SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Class TUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.TUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteUI, UI, Serializable, Remote
public class TUI extends Object implements RemoteUI, UI
Represents the Textual User Interface (TUI) for the game. Implements the RemoteUI and UI interfaces.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer() throws IOException, AlreadyStartedGameException, MaxNumberOfPlayersException, WrongMessageClassEnumException, InterruptedException, NotBoundException
      Adds the player to an existing game or creates a new game and adds the player to it.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an input/output error while reading the user's input.
      AlreadyStartedGameException - if the game has already started.
      MaxNumberOfPlayersException - if the maximum number of players is exceeded.
      WrongMessageClassEnumException - if the message class enum is incorrect.
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted.
      NotBoundException - if the RMI registry is not bound.

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn() throws VoidBoardTileException, SelectionNotValidException, PlayerIsWaitingException, TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException, ColumnNotValidException, SelectionIsEmptyException, WrongConfigurationException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException, IOException, PickDoesntFitColumnException, WrongMessageClassEnumException, InterruptedException
      Plays a turn in the game.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in interface RemoteUI
      Throws:
      VoidBoardTileException - if a tile on the board is void.
      SelectionNotValidException - if the tile selection is not valid.
      PlayerIsWaitingException - if the player is waiting.
      TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException - if the size of the tile selection is different from the order length.
      ColumnNotValidException - if the selected column is not valid.
      SelectionIsEmptyException - if the tile selection is empty.
      WrongConfigurationException - if the configuration is wrong.
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the picked column is out of bounds.
      IOException - if there is an input/output error.
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - if the pick doesn't fit in the column.
      WrongMessageClassEnumException - if the message class enum is incorrect.
      InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted.
